name: A Type of Life
description:
A narrative-driven combat typing game where our main protagonist, Tommy, depicts life matters as giant kaiju battles! You can think of kaiju as giant monster, like Godzilla or King Kong. Type your way through these battles and progress through the narrative of Tommy!

NOTE: During the dialogue cutscenes, there are parts where dialogue looks like this:

The ">>" characters indicate that you need to type something, and that something is what is seen on the left with matching cases.  This is what Tommy says. This isn't something communicated very well and is something that will be worked on, maybe.

Our team

Blong Timothy Yang as Team Lead

Annie Zhao as Programmer

Ethan Daniel De Vera as Programmer

Christian Tejada Segumalian as Programmer
